plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit
No. 07-1512

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                             Appellee,

                                v.

                          PEDRO PIMENTEL,

                      Defendant, Appellant.



                           ERRATA SHEET


     The opinion of this Court issued on August 21, 2008, is
amended as follows:

     On page 2, line 7:   change "instructed" to "instructing."
